resources.string: [zh-TW]This reference app is the starting point for any new patient medical or consumer mobile app. It is made up of configurable common components which are all part of the CDP2 Platform. It will help accelerate your app development, harmonize UX across Philips and ensures appropriate integration with HSDP.

[zh-TW]AppInfra is the components top level module. It gathers all the modules delivered by the AppInfra Common Component into one single structure. AppInfra facilitates dependency injection into common components and other software pieces that make use of the AppInfra functionalities.

[zh-TW]Whenever users find any difficulty in using the app, they can use the Consumer Care feature to get the issues resolved. The app provides a number of ways the users can access Consumer Care support, such as live chat, e-mail, call, tweet, Facebook post, and so on.

[zh-TW]Connectivity feature in Reference App, provides the ability to pair the mobile application with a reference device using Bluetooth capability for capturing the data from the device to the mobile application.

[zh-TW]Data Services is a common component that acts as a gateway to data core. It will provide synchronization with application data base for the below support the following types of data -\n
  • Moments, Consents, Insights, Push notification and user characteristics.

[zh-TW]In App Purchase feature in Reference App, provides the ability to buy products from the app for the users, which would give users the convenience of shopping anytime-anywhere. This approach also will boost marketing and sales.

[zh-TW]Product registration is a common component, which facilitates the user to create/login into My Philips account and Register a Normal Product where by providing CTN Number, Serial Number(Mandatory) and Date of Purchase.
[zh-TW]UI Toolkit is a component that provides UI controls that are present in the designs provided by the design team on all the screens of the mobile application.

[zh-TW]User registration feature in Reference App provides the ability of registering a new user accessing the mobile application, for logging into the application using valid organization social media specific credentials.

[zh-TW]"Special offers, promotions and first hand information about new product releases.
Tailored for you!

Join 140.000 of your peers now!"

[zh-TW]AppInfra is the component\'s top level module. It gathers all the modules delivered by the AppInfra Common Component into one single structure. AppInfra facilitates dependency injection into common components and other software pieces that make use of the AppInfra functionalities.

[zh-TW]Connectivity feature in Reference App, provides the ability to pair the mobile application with a reference device using Bluetooth capability for capturing the data from the device to the mobile application

[zh-TW]Whenever users find any difficulty in using the app, they can use the Consumer Care feature to get the issues resolved. The app provides a number of ways the users can access Consumer Care support, such as live chat, e-mail, call, tweet, Facebook post, and so on.

[zh-TW]Data Services is a common component that acts as a gateway to data core. It will provide synchronization with application data base for the below support the following types of data: Moments, Consents, Insights, Push notification and user characteristics

[zh-TW]In App Purchase feature in Reference App, provides the ability to buy products from the app for the users, which would give users the convenience of shopping anytime-anywhere. This approach also will boost marketing and sales

[zh-TW]Product registration is a common component, which facilitates the user to create/login into My Philips account and Register a Normal Product where by providing CTN Number, Serial Number(Mandatory) and Date of Purchase
[zh-TW]UI Toolkit is a component that provides UI controls that are present in the designs provided by the design team on all the screens of the mobile application

[zh-TW]User registration feature in Reference App provides the ability of registering a new user accessing the mobile application, for logging into the application using valid organization / social media specific credentials
[zh-TW]You can make Philips purchases or via 3rd party retailers here.
[zh-TW]You can contact Philips consumer care here. Consumer Care is the destination for all Philips questions, product information and reviews.

[zh-TW]This reference app is the starting point for any new patient medical or consumer mobile app. It is made up of configurable common components which are all part of the CDP2 Platform. It will help accelerate your app development, harmonize UX across Philips and ensures appropriate integration with HSDP.
[zh-TW]Wait..While we fetch your sleep data from device

[zh-TW]ReferenceApp is a base platform used by all propositions to develop and maintain features both generic and specific to the propositions. App infra, Data Gateway, App FWK, and UIToolkit allow Apps to be created from uApps and UI-less services/libraries. ReferenceApp acts as a foundation over which CDP2 uApps and proposition specific uApps are integrated to form individual apps.

[zh-TW]This app integrates the common components required to develop new IoT solutions for acceleration across Philips. It is the first reference for the development of all new patient medical or consumer mobile apps.
[zh-TW]Designers, developers and business leaders across Philips.
[zh-TW]Reference App comprises all of the configurable common components that are part of the CDP2 platform.
[zh-TW]It provides all the reference information and tools needed to accelerate and harmonize UX development and ensure appropriate HSDP integration.
[zh-TW]The UX has been fully approved by Philips Design and will soon be in DLS.
[zh-TW]The complete platform is tagged and delivers data to monitor &amp; improve your proposition.
[zh-TW]The Security &amp; Privacy actions of the complete platform are fully in line with Philips rule.
[zh-TW]Localization of your proposition is enabled by the platform, including China.
[zh-TW]<html>The CDP<sup><small>2<small>&<sup> platform is fully integrated with HSDP and IT to ensure all functionalities are enabled end-2-end within the Philips landscape.</html>
提案特定大型文字在本文
您輸入或選取了無效的參數值。請選擇適當的參數值，然後再次啟動
[zh-TW]I allow Philips to store binary data
[zh-TW]I allow Philips to use my mobile application usage statistics
[zh-TW]I allow Philips to use my data for Coaching purposes
[zh-TW]The actual content of the binary consent help text here
我允許飛利浦收集我的應用程式資料，以協助應用程式運作、改善應用程式、個人化應用程式、整合社交媒體並顯示相關內容及廣告。

Cookie 聲明

此應用程式使用的 Adobe Analytics 是一款由 Adobe Systems Software Ireland Limited (下稱「Adobe」) 提供的分析服務 (下稱「Adobe Analytics」)。Adobe Analytics 使用「cookie」或相似技術，這類技術會放置文字檔案在您的應用程式中，以協助應用程式分析通過應用程式的整體流量模式。cookie 產生關於應用程式使用的資訊後會傳送給 Adobe，我們的設定會確保 IP 位址在地理位置化前匿名處理，並會在儲存前以一個一般性 IP 位址取代。Adobe 將代表飛利浦使用此資訊，用以評估您使用應用程式的情形、為飛利浦彙整應用程式活動報告，以及用以向飛利浦提供與應用程式活動及應用程式使用的其他相關服務。Adobe 不會將您的 IP 位址與任何其他 Adobe 所持有的資料建立關聯。如果您在關閉此畫面後選擇不接受，則 Adobe 和飛利浦便不會收集及使用您的資料 (cookie 和 IP 位址)。
[zh-TW]The actual content of the coaching consent help text here

經取得您的同意，飛利浦集團公司會透過電子郵件、簡訊及其他數位管道 (例如行動應用程式和社交媒體) 與您聯繫，向您提供宣傳通訊。為了提供符合您喜好和行為模式的通訊內容，並給予您最佳的個人化體驗，我們會對您的個人資料進行分析及整合。這些資料可能包含： 

您提供給我們的資料
您主動與我們分享的資料，例如：您的姓名、生日或年齡、電子郵件地址、實體地址、國家、性別、電話號碼、社交媒體個人檔案。

從您與飛利浦互動過程中取得的資料
您與飛利浦數位管道 (例如社交媒體、網站、電子郵件、應用程式及連結產品) 互動和使用這些管道的相關資料。這些資料可能包含：IP 位址、Cookie、裝置資訊、您點按的通訊內容、詳細位置資料，以及您造訪的網站

飛利浦也提供機會，讓您可隨時撤回同意。
如需更多資訊，請閱讀飛利浦隱私權聲明及飛利浦 Cookie 聲明。
[zh-TW]The actual content of the moment consent help text here
[zh-TW]The actual content of the research and analytics consent help text here
[zh-TW]I allow Philips to store my data in cloud
[zh-TW]I allow Philips to use my data for Research and Analytics purposes

[zh-TW]We’ve detected that you have rooted the device or jailbroken, thereby making it easier for others to access your data and no security on your application data.
[zh-TW]We’ve detected that you have jailbroken and not activated screenlock, thereby making it easier for others to access your data. We recommend enabling your screenlock.
[zh-TW]We’ve detected the screenlock of your mobile phone is to enabled, thereby making it easier for others to access your data. We recommend enabling your screenlock.
根據我的喜好和線上行為模式，接收來自飛利浦宣傳訊息
僅能在啟動時變更設定。您需要重新啟動應用程式才能進行變更
更新使用者資料時發生錯誤。請過一段時間後再試一次
